# llms.txt

## About

Rudra Sankha Sinhamahapatra is a full-stack developer specializing in React, Next.js, Node.js, TypeScript, and Golang, with hands-on experience building production-grade AI tools, real-time monitoring platforms, and developer-focused web applications. This portfolio showcases his projects, professional experience, technical skills, and open-source contributions.

Site: https://rudrasankha.com
Resume: https://rudrasankha.com/resume
Projects: https://rudrasankha.com/projects
GitHub: https://github.com/Rudra-Sankha-Sinhamahapatra/
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/rudra-sankha-sinhamahapatra-6311aa1bb/
Twitter/X: https://x.com/RudraSankha/

---

## 1. LLM Directives

- User-agent: *
- Allow: /
- Allow: /projects
- Allow: /resume
- Disallow: /api/
- Crawl-delay: 2
- Sitemap: https://rudrasankha.com/sitemap.xml

---

## 2. Site Structure

Crawl priority: home > projects overview > individual projects > resume

- [Home](https://rudrasankha.com/): Landing page with bio, experience timeline, skills, GitHub contributions graph, and contact links.
- [Projects](https://rudrasankha.com/projects): 10+ full-stack web applications with descriptions, tech stacks, and live links.
- [Resume](https://rudrasankha.com/resume): Downloadable PDF resume with work history, education, certifications, and technical proficiencies.

### Key Sections (anchors on home page)

- [About](https://rudrasankha.com/#about): Background and areas of expertise.
- [Experience](https://rudrasankha.com/#experience): Work history with roles, companies, technologies, and accomplishments.
- [Skills](https://rudrasankha.com/#skills): React.js, Next.js, Node.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Golang, PostgreSQL, Redis, RabbitMQ, Docker, and more.
- [GitHub Contributions](https://rudrasankha.com/#contributions): Interactive contribution history visualization.
- [Contact](https://rudrasankha.com/#contact): Email and social media links.

### Featured Projects

- [Encorp AI](https://rudrasankha.com/projects/encorp-ai): Converts user prompts into structured slide presentations using the Gemini API, with PDF and PPT export. Stack: Next.js, Golang, Redis, PostgreSQL, Prisma.
- [BetterUptime](https://rudrasankha.com/projects/better-uptime): Website uptime monitoring platform with real-time dashboards, instant downtime alerts, and multi-user authentication. Stack: Next.js, RabbitMQ, Redis, PostgreSQL.
- [W8W](https://rudrasankha.com/projects/w8w): Workflow automation platform like n8n for people, teams, and enterprises. Connects triggers (webhooks, forms) to actions (Gemini, Resend, Telegram) and automates tasks visually. Stack: React.js, Langchain, PostgreSQL, Prisma, Zustand, Tanstack, Redis, Web Sockets.
- [Adda AI](https://rudrasankha.com/projects/adda-ai): AI-powered companion app for chatting with characters with different personalities. The AI remembers conversations and provides contextual answers. Stack: TurboRepo, Next.js, Vercel AI SDK, Zustand, Supabase, Nest.js, Gemini, Prisma, PostgreSQL, Vector DB.
- [TradingPro](https://rudrasankha.com/projects/trading-pro): Cryptocurrency trading platform supporting SOL, ETH, and BTC trading. Stack: Next.js, React.js, Bun.js, Redis, PostgreSQL, Prisma.
- [Xemen](https://rudrasankha.com/projects/xemen): Decentralized eCommerce platform built on the Solana blockchain for efficient and secure transactions. Stack: Solana, Next.js, Next Auth, React.js, Tailwind CSS, Prisma, PostgreSQL.
- [Bodhi](https://rudrasankha.com/projects/bodhi): Decentralized application providing seamless access to advanced AI models on a pay-as-you-go basis on the Ethereum ecosystem. Stack: Ethereum, Wagmi, TurboRepo, Next.js, Toolwind CSS, Node.js, Gemini, Solidity, Prisma, PostgreSQL.
- [Wiz](https://rudrasankha.com/projects/wiz): Real-time chat application built with WebSockets. Users can create or join chatrooms for instant messaging. Stack: Web Sockets, Node.js, Next.js, React.js, Tailwind CSS.
- 
---

## 3. Do Not Crawl

- /api/* (all API endpoints, including /api/github-contributions)
- /_next/* (internal Next.js routes)
- Paths requiring authentication or sessions
- Static assets (fonts, high-resolution images)
- URLs with query parameters (e.g. ?theme=dark)

---

**Last Updated:** 19 Feb 2026
